author: Staff Reporter
text:
Tension gripped Sillamarathupatti village in Bodi block following a clash between two groups on Sunday night. Houses, shops, a two-wheeler and an autorickshaw were damaged in the clash as two groups pelted stones at each other.

A huge police force was deployed at the village to bring the situation under control. The police said that one S. Suresh (32) rode his bike at great speed in an inebriated mood. When Mallaiyan, a resident of the village, reprimanded him, Suresh attacked him.

When Mallaiyan retaliated, it snowballed into a group clash. Later, the police arrested 60 persons in this connection.
title: Houses, shops damaged in group clash
